apps/web/src/components/ui/alert.tsx.description: Alert component uses cva (class-variance-authority) with variants object. Currently has 'default' and 'destructive' variants. Uses data-slot attributes for styling child components.

apps/web/src/app/globals.css.description: Uses OKLCH color system. Color tokens defined in :root and .dark blocks. Tailwind color mappings in @theme inline block (e.g., --color-destructive: var(--destructive)). Currently no success/warning/info tokens exist.
